markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Arboreal Regent](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2831)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Arboreal regents are lumbering, solitary creatures responsible for guarding an entire forest. They take an especially long view of affairs and never act brashly or without much deliberation. They occasionally come together in small groups called groves to share news and pass their wisdom down to the [arboreal wardens](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2829) that have sprouted under their watch. In times of grave danger, all the groves in a region may gather for a great months-long meeting to plan and, eventually, act upon a threat.

 The typical arboreal regent is 30 feet tall, has a trunk 2 feet in diameter, and weighs 4,500 pounds.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Plant](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 24

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Arboreal_Regent.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Arboreal Regent](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2831)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=668" />
<trait label="Wood" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=508" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 25 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +18; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=69)

**Languages**
[Arboreal](/Languages.aspx?ID=26), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Fey](/Languages.aspx?ID=119); [_speak with plants_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1681)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +19, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +16, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +16, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +18, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** -1

**Con** +6

**Int** +1

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 26 

**Fort** +20 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +16 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 150

</row>

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 5, piercing 5

**Weaknesses**
[axes](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=1) 5, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604) 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
branch +19 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d12+7 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
root +19 ([Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 2d8+7 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
rock +19 ([Brutal](/Traits.aspx?ID=249), [range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 2d10+7 bludgeoning

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 26
- **Constant (4th)**
[Speak with Plants](/Spells.aspx?ID=294)

**Awaken Tree** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) The arboreal regent causes a tree within 180 feet to uproot itself and fight as a minion using the statistics for an [awakened tree](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2830). The arboreal regent can control up to two awakened trees at a time, and they can issue commands to both trees as a single action, which has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561) and [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=541) traits.

**Sunder Objects**   When an arboreal regent damages an item or structure, they deal an additional 2d10 damage to that item or structure.

**[Throw Rock](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=80)** <actions string="Single Action" />  

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-364" />
name: Arboreal Regent
